mapper.select: Select t2.voucher_id, order_status, title,available_range, price,term, t2.id, pay_time, t2.create_time from tb_voucher t1 left join tb_voucher_order t2 ON t1.voucher_id = t2.voucher_id where t2.user_id = #{user_id} AND order_status <> 0

SELECT t2.voucher_id, title, available_range, price, duration FROM tb_voucher t1 LEFT JOIN tb_voucher_order t2 ON t1.voucher_id = t2.voucher_id WHERE t2.user_id = #{user_id} AND available_range LIKE concat('%', #{room_name}, '%') AND duration <= #{duration} AND order_status = 1
